title: hold-coins
author: hold-coins
content: I have a $100 Chili's on the border gift card. Looking to get $65 crypto I can sell on coinbase.I will sell it for $55 paypal. Just need the cash. In q tough spot financially!Â you can check the balance with the numbers but you're not going to get that until trade is verified and I want to buy just something I need some cash so I don't know whatever I can put on coinbase and sell for USD to put on my PayPal I don't sell much here I tried to do it on paxful but I have to have the minimum amount to cover it I'll send first to highly trusted members I understand I'm not trusted so I'll probably will have to send first and I'm okay with that depending on your trust..
